hints.content:
Every coin has a different value.

Coin name | Picture | Value
- | - | -
Penny | ![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/d0799f515398b1f48cb0baa7bdc8d0c12e26c70c.png) | $1¢$
Nickel | ![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/f6c7ae82228012be92b624995809aeabc8e95370.png) | $5¢$
Dime | ![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/2017369b968caa0c88d046bddf2406665c8cd34d.png) | $10¢$
Quarter | ![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/1cc5cb6f4c779c49984f5a63a58443ce0ca96ff9.png) | $25¢$

Let's label the value of each coin.

![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/659453fcf69a81b668069e792b54f7ebf411c620.png)

$\underbrace{\blueE{25¢} + \blueE{25¢} + \blueE{25¢} }_{\blueE{3}{\text{ quarters}}}  + \underbrace{\goldE{5¢} + \goldE{5¢}}_{\goldE{2}{\text{ nickels}}} + \underbrace{\maroonD{1¢}}_{\maroonD{1}{\text{ penny}}}$

Now, let's add our quarters first: $\blueE{25¢} +\blueE{25¢} + \blueE{25¢} = \blueE{75¢}$

$\underbrace{\blueE{75¢}}_{\blueE{3}{\text{ quarters}}}  + \underbrace{\goldE{5¢} + \goldE{5¢}}_{\goldE{2}{\text{ nickels}}} + \underbrace{\maroonD{1¢}}_{\maroonD{1}{\text{ penny}}}$

Next, let's add our nickels: $\goldE{5¢} + \goldE{5¢} = \goldE{10¢}$

$\underbrace{\blueE{75¢}}_{\blueE{3}{\text{ quarters}}}  + \underbrace{\goldE{10¢}}_{\goldE{2}{\text{ nickels}}} + \underbrace{\maroonD{1¢}}_{\maroonD{1}{\text{ penny}}}$

Last, let's add the value of all our coins together.

$\underbrace{\blueE{75¢}}_{\blueE{3}{\text{ quarters}}}  + \underbrace{\goldE{10¢}}_{\goldE{2}{\text{ nickels}}} + \underbrace{\maroonD{1¢}}_{\maroonD{1}{\text{ penny}}} = 86¢$

question.content:
**What is the total value of the coins below?**  

![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/659453fcf69a81b668069e792b54f7ebf411c620.png)

[[☃ numeric-input 1]] cents
